page.title: 10EAST LINTON OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
The following information was gathered about the fathers' occupations.
Building trade 8, Mechanic 3, Torness Power Station-Engineers and labourers 6, Clinical scientist 1, On the land-farmer, market gardener 3, Publican 1, Solicitor 1,Teacher 1, Shop assistant 2, Post Office 1, Grain merchant 1, British Rail 1, Police Force 1, Accountant 1, Engineer (not Torness) 1,Driver 3, Highway Inspector 1, Unemployed 1.
PLACE OF WORK
East Linton 10 Within 10 miles of East Linton 20 Edinburgh 6 Dalkeith 1
